alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Central Oregon Coast Range; Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 11 at 2:27PM PDT until August 14 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 603 AND 604... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 603 East Slopes of the Central Oregon Coast Range and Fire Weather Zone 604 Willamette Valley. * WINDS...North wind 13 to 17 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...15 to 25%. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of highest concern is Sunday afternoon and evening, particularly between Salem and Eugene.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Central Oregon Coast Range; Willamette Valley
